fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Every night you can choose one of the following abilities:
-Change the next day to be day 2211 (and continue as normal)
-Make each players postcount and votecount for the last day  be equal to  2211  (meaning the hammer yesterday was 2211*the number of players on the person)
-Change the playerlist to be equal to 2211(number of players in game=2211)
-Change the length of every player's name and role to be equal to 2211 (their roles and names arent changed; just it counts as that)
